pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Bombardier CRJ-Pedestal-Radio Tuning Unit Panel See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
- This instrument has a user prop to control either the Pilot or CoPilot side unit.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
